#library

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
from sklearn.preprocessing import PolynomialFeatures
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
from numpy import sqrt
import operator
from prettytable import PrettyTable
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from IPython.display import Markdown as md
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.c79155ba:
Labelencoder = LabelEncoder()
df['date_time'] = Labelencoder.fit_transform(df['date_time'])
df['holiday'] = Labelencoder.fit_transform(df['holiday'])
df['weather_main'] = Labelencoder.fit_transform(df['weather_main'])
df['weather_description'] = Labelencoder.fit_transform(df['weather_description'])
source.bd211bb8:
#menentukan variable dependen
x = df['traffic_volume'].values.reshape(df['traffic_volume'].size,1)
#menentukan variable independen
y = df['holiday'].values.reshape(df['holiday'].size,1)
source.aae19645:
#Melatih linear Regression model
lin_reg = LinearRegression()
lin_reg.fit(x,y)
source.800060bd:
# Fitting Polynomial Regression ke dataset , degree=1
degree = 1
poly_reg = PolynomialFeatures(degree = degree)  
x_poly = poly_reg.fit_transform(x)
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(x_poly, y)
y_poly_pred = model.predict(x_poly)
source.260f340c:
#fungsi rmse
rmse = sqrt(mean_squared_error(y,y_poly_pred))

#fungsi r2
r2 = r2_score(y,y_poly_pred)
source.778a6c21:
#Visualisasi hasil polynomial regression
plt.scatter(x,y)
sort_axis = operator.itemgetter(0)
sorted_zip = sorted(zip(x,y_poly_pred), key=sort_axis)
x, y_poly_pred = zip(*sorted_zip)
plt.title('Polynomial Regression\n')
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.ylabel('y')

plt.plot(x, y_poly_pred, color='g')
plt.show()

#table parameter
tabel_parameter = PrettyTable(['parameter', 'nilai'])
tabel_parameter.add_row(['polynomial\ndegree', degree])
tabel_parameter.add_row(['RMSE','{:.10}'.format(rmse)])
tabel_parameter.add_row(['R^2', '{:.10}'.format(r2)])
print(tabel_parameter)
display_equation(model)
